name: Escape The Room VR
description:
This is a short escape-the-room style game made for the June Game Jam for Epic Games.

This game was made in one weekend by a sole developer.

*HTC VIVE IS REQUIRED TO PLAY*

Recommended play space is 2.5mx.2.5m ++. Larger is better. Game may be playable in smaller spaces, but it has not been tested.

Known Issues: On minimum spec VR machines, some frame drops are noticable.
